entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Include known TFM values in NETSDK1129 error when publishing a multi-targeted project #32332
  • `wasm-tools` workload breaks `dotnet publish` in docker #32327

Closed

  • Build performance regression #32004

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #32339
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32338
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add known TFMs to multitarget-publish error message #32333
    untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #32331
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32326
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2175545 #32308
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Follow-up to #31559 #32047
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add debian to the SupportsTargetFramework logic. #32127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change
  • [release/7.0.4xx] added `Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Utils.dll` to package content #32301
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32307
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package #29787
    Area-ILLink
